mapper.insert: insert into asset_freeze (id, user_id, freeze_asset_cny, freeze_asset_us, `status`) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{freezeAssetCny,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{freezeAssetUs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, freeze_asset_cny, freeze_asset_us, `status` from asset_freeze
